story_parts.text: The stormtrooper was on a mission to steal a valuable piece of art from a wealthy family. The family had a lot of security, so the stormtrooper had to be very careful. He/she made a plan and executed it perfectly. The stormtrooper got in and out without being seen and got the painting.

next_options.0: The stormtrooper returned to the base and reported the successful mission to the commanding officer
next_options.1: The stormtrooper was caught by the family's security guards and was arrested

story_parts.text: The stormtrooper returned to the base and reported the successful mission to the commanding officer. The officer was very pleased and congratulated the stormtrooper on a job well done.

next_options.0: The stormtrooper was given a new mission
next_options.1: The stormtrooper was given a reward

options.0: A soldier in the Imperial Army of the Galactic Empire in the Star Wars universe
options.1: A type of droid used by the Galactic Empire
options.2: A type of clone used by the Galactic Republic
options.3: A type of ship used by the Galactic Empire
